name: Greed: Souls & Money
description:
Greed is a cooperative dungeon-crawler / tower defense for two players.

The first character — Greedy Knight — had once let loose and set off into an irrepressible binge. Now, when his sinful soul have gone to the power of Mammon — the god of Greed — the Knight have got a strong crave for curing his illness. He goes into the possessions of greedy god and makes the deal about pacifying rebelling sinners. As an assist god presents his faithful servant, careerist and dungeon master — the Guide.

Knight's gameplay is action-oriented: he moves around the map, fight with rebels and capture the three rooms, each opening an unique bonuses. Guide that has a manager-oriented gameplay is coordinating the Knight on the location and gets an opportunity of upgrading abilities when one room is captured. For instance, capturing the Room of War, Knight opens to Guide combat abilities, which are can be used as on the real map, so on the virtual prototype of it, which is possessed by Guide.

Will Knight get his soul by accomplishing the contract, and will Guide get his long-awaited promotion — it is all depends on balance between chaotic running around the rooms and well-verified financial management.
